name: "NINJA NINJA" Bicycle grips (BLACK)
description:
WOHO ! ATTACK

Proudly present the "Ninja Grips" The unique oriental aesthetic and fine details Inspired by the art of samurai sword 100% High quality designed in Taiwan and made in Taiwan Feel the Asian life style with our creative bike products NOW! Installations: 1.The best recommended with compression air or apply soapy water to the contact finish to rotate and slide it in place. 2.Thick wall to the palm. Attentions: 1.Smooth and clean finish of handle bar is recommended for the best non-slip. 2.No ammonia.Soap water is preferred if compression air is not available. Size: 146 x 56 x 56 mm or 5.74″ x 2.2″ x 2.2″ Weight: 128g Color: BLACK Item No.: GRP-001-01

name: "FIREFLY" saddle bag S (BLACK)
description:
DROP A LIGHT IN!

The bag attaches to the underside of your bike saddle/seat with three velcro straps holding your seat & seat post. An aerodynamic rounded shape minimizes wind resistance when riding, and water resistant material and a water proofed zipper prevents your valuables from getting soaked in the rain. It is made of a soft, reflective and translucent plastic reinforced with a fine layer of netting. Simply drop a light in it, and you have yourself a "FIREFLY" lamp! Added features: 3M Scotchlite™ Retro-reflector Logo Coating /-25℃ Resistible PVC /Water-Proof Zipper Attachment: Nylon Straps/Buckle Size: 9 x 16 x 11cm or 3.5" x 6.3" x 4.3" Capacity: 0.65 L Item NO.: SDB-001-01 Color: BLACK

name: CELLPHONE BAG (BLACK)
description:
WOHO! ATTACK

Flip-Down Phone Pouch to provide quick phone access on the go. It mounts to the shoulder straps of messenger bags and backpacks, and allows you to answer, view screen and navigate your phone without removing it from the pouch. The Flip-Down Phone Pouch features a clear sleeve for quick and easy phone navigation, and ID/Credit Card and Coins pockets. It fits for 3" - 4.5" smartphones and mounts to most messenger bags and backpacks with an interlocking Velcro system for maximum security. *May not be compatible with all Phone cases Added features: Flip-down design for quick access to phone Clear touchscreen sleeve for quick and easy phone navigation ID/Credit Card & Coins Pockets FIT: Mounts to messenger bags or backpack straps and belts vertically or horizontally with interlocking Velcro system for maximum security 3" - 4.5" smartphones FABRICATION: Weatherproof 600 denier TPU coated outer shell Weatherproof WOHO logo zippers Size: 39 x 10 x 3 Cm or 15.3 x 3.9 x 1.1” (FIT For 3" - 4.5" screen smartphones) Color: Black Item No.: CPB-001-01

name: "FLYING FENDER" M (TRANSPARENT)
description:
WATER WILL BE SCARED!

Flying Fender is a stylish, foldable, fender that mimics the looks of a Gundam Wing model. The installation process is very similar to putting together a model Gundam. Installing and removing the Flying Fender are both done instantaneously and with ease. If you want something more stylish than the normal, bulky fenders, you should definitely consider the Flying Fender. Not only does it look cool, its super convenient and can bend and flex to be stowed away in your bag for a rainy day. There is a vast array of wonderful colors to choose from to mix and match with your bicycle. When it rains, don’t be afraid. Just use the Flying Fender to block rain and dirt from ruining your clothes and bicycle. Added features: WOHO Revolutionary Design “Flying Fender” can be curled up and easily stored into a saddle bag or pocket and Easy to install and remove by a special non-slip Velcro strap. It also can be tied to the frame without any hassle. During a rainy day just strap it onto the bike frame and go. On a sunny day, roll it up and put it away. Mainly meant for emergencies when stranded in the rain. It is designed with simple lines, shapes and rich colors. Colors can be mix and matched and purchased separately to keep your bike styling. WOHO “Flying Fender” is patented product with Plat packing; bring out your DIY spirit. Size: (70 x 10.5cm, 27.5 x 4.1") Fit for down tube external diameter up to 16cm ,Site tube up to Φ32mm,Tires up to 700 x 25c or same width tire. Attachment: Special anti-slip Velcro strap. Weight: 45g with one strap / 50g with two Fabrics: With the environment in mind, the “Flying Fender” is made with non-toxic material that can decompose naturally and being test proof can be folded thousand times. Color: TRANSPARENT Item No.: FND-001-00
